Text.Page:
They do some crazy stuff in Castanica, . You walk into an alley, and some guy will be selling you some weird thing you've never even heard of.

And I hear—from a friend of a friend, of course—that one of the things they sell are the bones of {@LinkCreature:4#2031#eldritch cardinals}.

Medicinal purposes, maybe? Don't know, don't wanna know. But I like money just fine...
I'll send these off to Castanica. Here's your cut. And don't tell the other soldiers. I want to keep a good thing quiet.

Your business, friend. If you aren't going to help out, though, I'd appreciate a little discretion on your part.

Don't tell anyone about how I'm paying top coin for eldritch bones, eh?
